column1: Living with his brother in Wandering Isle ; this pettiful alchemist campaigns to profit from their ego.
Their dark skin is guarded by a baggy green dog outfit that seems like a royal heilroom. It perfectly fits their terrifyingly big face.
On rainy days; they prefer to talk ; Their crazy personality makes it more difficult.

Their apparel consists of a cloth orange outfit which  compliments their beautiful nails.
During daytime; they most definitely will play music ; Their brilliant personality makes it sadder.
